message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $95.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses lower. Would you consider selling the product for $85?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I value this product highly, I could meet you halfway at $90.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, would you be able to offer the product at $82?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but $82 is really pushing my limit.  How about we split the difference and call it $86?
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I believe I can't go above $84 for the product. Would you be able to meet me at this price?
